title: Historical context and end of Cold War

content.description:
WANG GUANGYI, CHINESE PAINTER, COCA-COLA, PAINTING, CIRCA 1995

Paul Strawson / Alamy

The painting shows Chinese youths dressed in the style typically depicted in communist propaganda posters, but with the Coca-Cola corporate logo in the background. The painting has been displayed in several galleries and museums in China.
content.question: In which of the following twentieth-century historical contexts would artists have been most likely to display works that carry messages similar to that conveyed by Wang Guangyiâ€™s painting?

choices.label: The Soviet Union after the death of Lenin
Russia after the end of the Cold War

content.answer: Russia after the end of the Cold War
